subject: Standard Request for Pre-Qualification (RFQ) for the Empanelment of Agencies for Implementing Maintenance Works to be taken up on Risk and Cost of the Concessionaire/ Contractor - reg.
text: HRa 7rty rTHRf qferasrot (73w5 4Rae7 & RNTANf 4314, HRT FTTT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hqtia j 01-5 Qd 6, 7ezr-10, ERAT, 78 fovft 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 3r44/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Consultancy/ 2025 Policy Circular No.10.2.44/2025 dated 03ra March, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. HOUDIV-13/5/2024-HOU Division (Comp. No. 269722)} Sub: Standard Request for Pre-Qualification (RFQ) for the Empanelment of Agencies for Implementing Maintenance Works to be taken up on Risk and Cost of the Concessionairel Contractor reg: NHAI vide Policy Circular No. 10.2.37/2024 dated 08.07.2024 (CP:1-6) has issued the SOP for Implementation of Risk and Cost Measures for Maintenance Works in Contract modes through Rajasthan Division. The Policy Circular in its Para 5 States that each RO will identify and empanel a Pool of Qualified Agencies with expertise in the required domain based on Standard RFQ approved by NHAI HQ and the Empanelment of Agencies would be done once in every Two Years in four categories. 2. Accordingly, the Standard RFQ Document for  the Empanelment of Agencies for Implementing Maintenance Works to be taken Up on Risk and Cost of the Concessionaire/ Contractor has been approved by the Competent Authority and is attached as Annexure-I to this Policy Circular_ 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: Annexure-I: Standard Request for Pre-Qualification (RFQ). Jlo:l2g (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: AII Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2_ Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3 Web Admin for circulation: A 7 7M NHAI Copy
